node.title: After 13 days of searching for William Tyrrell, authorities have uncovered more questions
node.description: After seven years, it has come down to an area of bush about the size of four football fields. But two weeks in to the renewed search for William Tyrrell, the main things uncovered areÂ more questions.
node.content:
["After seven years, it has come down to an area of bush about the size of four football fields.", "But two weeks into the renewed search for William Tyrrell, the main things uncovered are\u00a0more questions.", "NSW Police sent a media alert at 4:41am on Friday saying they'd provide an update on their searches at Kendall, on the NSW Mid-North Coast, later that morning.", "When Detective Chief Superintendent Darren Bennett fronted the cameras, about 8:30am, he said: \"It's painstaking.\u00a0It's difficult \u2026\u00a0we're very happy with the progress so far, but we've got no great milestone to report.\"", "", "
Cadaver dog Wags is only one of two in the state and is part of the search for William.(ABC News: Mark Reddie)
", "Earlier this month, he said \"new information\" had led to the renewed search.", "Officers have been scouring an area about 900 metres from where the boy was last seen, at his late foster-grandmother's home.", "It's now the new search zone.", "Why now and why this area after so many years?", "Very few members of the force's top brass can answer this \u2014\u00a0they fear doing so could compromise any chance of a breakthrough.", "", "
William Tyrrell went missing from his foster-grandmother's home in 2014.(Supplied: NSW Police)
", "The theory being explored is that William Tyrrell died after falling from the balcony of the home on September 12, 2014.", "Police believe his foster-grandmother's car \u2014\u00a0which is undergoing forensic examination \u2014 could have been used to dispose of his body off Batar Creek Road and Cobb and Co Road.", "Authorities have confirmed the William Tyrrell inquest will recommence next year and will include evidence found from the new search.", "Detective Chief Superintendent Bennet conceded police \"couldn't have picked a worse time\" to search.", "\"We will continue the timeframe of this search, which may be extended now because of the setbacks with regard to weather.\"", "Every morning, a\u00a0stream of 30 riot officers drive into the bush, armed with rakes and shovels.", "", "
Bad weather has this week hampered the search for William's remains.(ABC News: Mark Reddie)
", "Orders are given by Detective Senior Sergeant Mark Dukes, Detective Sergeant Andrew Lonergan and Detective Sergeant Scott Jamieson.", "The higher-ups are not above what is often messy work.", "Donning casual clothes, they slip on gloves and spend hours meticulously sifting through soil extracted from the ground by an excavator.", "Over 15 tonnes have been removed so far.", "Assisted by a team of academics, they hope to find fragments of bone or DNA.", "Forensic anthropologist Penny McCardle hobbles around in a moon boot, but it doesn't stop her from scouring the bush for evidence,\u00a0often helped by \"Wags\".", "", "
A car that belonged to William Tyrrell's foster-grandmother is still being examined.(Supplied: NSW Police)
", "He is one of only two cadaver dogs in the state and is from the town of Inverell, close to the Queensland border.", "Grave archaeologist Tony Lowe and hydrologist John Olley are also on deck.", "Mr Olley was confronted by a brown snake last week.", "He picked it up with a shovel, before carefully placing the deadly creature in another area of the bush, much to the shock of other officers.", "Red threads, blue and black cloth are \"colours of interest\" in Australia's most bizarre missing child case.", "That's because William was last seen wearing a Spider Man suit.", "", "
Many items uncovered from the site have been taken for forensic examination.(ABC News: Bruce Mackenzie)
", "Plenty of items uncovered from the site have been taken for forensic examination in Newcastle and Sydney, but sources close to the investigation say it's unlikely they are linked to the missing boy.", "Police divers arrived on Wednesday.", "Using a camera attached to a pole, they searched water and septic tanks at the toddler's late foster-grandmother's home.", "They found nothing.", "The next day, they went into a dam that runs between two farms, about 100 metres from the main dig site.", "Its water was deeper and murkier than normal because of recent downpours.", "\"It's pretty warm. We can't see anything, but we use our hands to claw through the mud at the bottom,\" one diver said.", "\"We haven't found anything yet,\" one diver said.", "If William Tyrrell's remains are found, senior detectives are confident it will happen at\u00a0this search site.", "At midday, the search breaks and many people inundate a local shop to get lunch.", "It's run by a woman called \"Jacqui\".", "\"We have been really busy, but not for the right reasons. We hope they find William Tyrrell,\" she said.", "\"It's so awful. Everyone wants answers.\""]
